name: City Highway Racing
description:
Are you FAN of fastest racing and drifting cars on the planet? Wanna experience fast and the very furious cars in the downtown city racing peak zone?
Then what are you waiting for. Download this free 3D racing plus drifting game with the amazing physics and RC controls.

City Highway Racing Features:
•Simple and smooth controls.
•Unlock exciting environments.
•Use the Nitro Boost to drive at incredibly high speeds.
•Amazing 3D graphics With Amusing Sounds Effects.
•Realistic Drift car driving Experience.
